sentence: Ecolab Inc. ( ECL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on March 17, 2017.
A cash dividend payment of $0.37 per share is scheduled to be paid on April 17, 2017.
Shareholders who purchased ECL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 5.71% increase over prior dividend payment.
The previous trading day's last sale of ECL was $125.37, representing a -0.63% decrease from the 52 week high of $126.17 and a 21.1% increase over the 52 week low of $103.53.
ECL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
ECL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $4.15.
Zacks Investment Research reports ECL's forecasted earnings growth in 2017 as 10.09%, compared to an industry average of 8.5%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the ECL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
